pages.title: Warm Biome Foraging
pages.text: Warm biomes such as Plains, Forests & Jungles  are some of the easiest and safest locations to find an abundance of foragables.

pages.title: Lavender
pages.text: Lavender can be found in Flower Forests

pages.title: Wild Wheat
pages.text: Wild Wheat can be found in Plains

pages.title: Wild Carrots
pages.text: Wild Carrots can be found in Dark Forests

pages.title: Wild Beetroots
pages.text: Wild Beetroots can be found in Birch Forests

pages.title: Wild Potatoes
pages.text: Wild Potatoes can be found in Jungles

pages.title: Apple Trees
pages.text: Apple Trees can be found in Flower Forests

pages.title: Cattails
pages.text: Cattails can be grown by submerging mud in water and using bonemeal on it to form Cattail Roots.

pages.title: Moss & Spore Blossoms
pages.text: Moss, Moss Vines, and Spore Blossoms grow underground in Jungles and other warm biomes, hanging off of Mossy Stones & Sporey Carmine
